column5: Any 5 pin PCB mounted female socket will do.
Might be cheaper from other sources.

column3: You can stack 2 spacers to a height of roughly 22 mm.
These are for the bottom side of the PCB.

column1: * Make sure that the legs you solder to the holes under the white rectangle mark are connected only when the switch is pressed! Test continuity with a multimeter if you are unsure.
